EmailTemplate.subject: Your application for The Challenge 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed.
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Thank you for submitting an application to work on The Challenge 2015.
Unfortunately your application has not reached the standard we require and as a result we will not be taking it further.
Due to the high number of applications we receive, we are unable to provide feedback for individual applicants.
Thank you for your interest in the NCS programmes.
Best Wishes
The Challenge
